code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";var reducers=combineReducers({auth:authReducer,form:formReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));export default store;
